data.name: Alpha & Beta
data.detailed_description:
Game Summary:

Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time

Story Summary:

Alpha and Beta are two brothers, but because of Alpha's greed and efficacy, the two brothers became hostile to each other and challenged each other to death. Let's see who's winning...

Game Features:

- 9 worlds, 36 levels, 4 special levels and 8 boss fight

- 19 different enemies, lot of traps and a some puzzling

- A satisfying gaming experience with a high level of difficulty

- Compatible graphics and music that will allow you to easily enter the atmosphere of the game

- Simple controls

- 7 powerups and 4 powerdowns

Average Gameplay Time: 30 Hours

Frequently Asked Questions:

We noticed that some customers had some reservations about purchasing the product when they visited the store page and needed some enlightenment on some issues, so we decided to add this section to our store page

Q: Is there a bit of freezing in the gameplay video or do I have problems in the game itself?

A: If you meet the minimum system requirements, you probably meet, you will not experience such a problem. The reason it looks like in the video is because of the problems on my computer, but if you are still having optimization problems, contact me mail

Q: Are you planning to make a novelty about graphics?

A: We have good news for graphics lovers, we will be working on graphics but we will do this work over time, we won't refresh all the graphics at once and we don't give any information about when these graphic works will be

Q: The game currently only supports 2 languages, will you add more languages?

A: I can't promise you that, but I can say that if there are enough requests to add language and volunteers who can help with translation we can add new languages to the game.

Q: Why do we want to know if the EULA contract is being requested from us and will the EULA contract be published in other languages?

A: I request the EULA contract only to protect our rights, the EULA contract will not be published in any language other than English

Note on Advanced Settings:

Advanced settings can be found in the options.ini file where the game is installed, we recommend that you change it according to the following notes

CreateTextureOnDemand = Do not change the value if your performance does not drop

AlternateSyncMethod = Do not change the value!

VertexBufferMethod = FPS i is the lockout setting but may cause delays, do not change the value if your performance is not falling

SleepMargin = Give your value to 1 if your system is very bad, give 5 if bad, give 10 if normal, give good value of 15, give 20 if it is very good, default value is 10(Note: Do not change the value if you do not have a negative performance)

Note: We recommend that you read the help when you first open the game

Note2: Please read "about save fies" announcements

data.short_description: Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® D1519
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
